@SenTedCruz One of the biggest mistakes of Mr. Trump's team is handing over the presidency of Voice of America to Ali Javanmardi. Mr. Javanmardi is a leftist and censors the Iranian people's struggle. Dismiss him.

@SenTedCruz The Islamic Republic is a violent regime whose ideology fuels instability beyond Iran’s borders. Even without direct military power, it arms and supports groups like Hamas, Hezbollah, the Houthis, and militias in Iraq, threatening regional and global security.#FreeIran
